result.reason: Architectural improvement to simplify adding connection properties by centralizing metadata (attributes or property objects) instead of requiring changes across 6+ locations — reduces developer friction and maintenance burden.
result.approach: Implement attribute-based approach: add custom attributes (e.g. [ConnectionProperty], [UsedInProtocols], [SharedProperty]) to AbstractConnectionInfo properties, then refactor serializers and ConfigWindow to discover properties via reflection instead of hardcoded lists. This is the lighter-weight option from the issue that preserves the existing property access pattern (connectionInfo.Hostname) while centralizing metadata. Phase 2 could migrate to IConnectionProperty<T> pattern if needed.
